Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
anims={"RightSlash","LeftSlash"} basedamage=2 slashdamage=8 specialprice=16 phi=.618033988 damage=basedamage lastclick=0 specialdebounce=true
handle=sp:WaitForChild("Handle") mesh=handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") specialsound=handle:FindFirstChild("SpecialSound") slashSound=handle:WaitForChild("SwingSound") energy=sp:WaitForChild("Energy") currentattack=sp:WaitForChild("CurrentAttack") sp:WaitForChild("RunAnim") debris=game:GetService("Debris") r=game:service("RunService")
function lunge() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Lunge" anim.Parent = sp end
function blow(hit) if hit.Parent~=nil then local humanoid=hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter=sp.Parent if vCharacter~=nil then local vPlayer=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer~=nil then local hum=vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then if hum~=nil and humanoid~=hum then local right_arm=vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm~=nil then local joint=right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint~=nil and (joint.Part0==handle or joint.Part1==handle) then tagHumanoid(humanoid,vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid,player) for i,v in ipairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=player creator_tag.Name="creator" creator_tag.Parent=humanoid debris:AddItem(creator_tag,1) end
function lunge() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Lunge" anim.Parent = sp end
function tween(thing,value,startv,endv,timev,ratev) local timev=timev or 1 local ratev=ratev or 1/30 if thing and value and startv and endv then local frames=math.floor(timev/ratev) local difv if value=="CFrame" then difv=(endv.p-startv.p) else difv=(endv-startv) end for frame=1,frames do if not thing then break end thing[value]=startv+difv*(frame/frames) wait(ratev) end end end
function spawnstick(cframe,lifetime,scale,sdamage) local cframe=cframe or CFrame.new() local sdamage=sdamage or 16 local scale=scale or Vector3.new(1,1,1) local lifetime=lifetime or 6 local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Stick" p.Anchored=true p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Brown") p.formFactor="Custom" p.Size=handle.Size*scale local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123968188" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123968836" m.Scale=mesh.Scale*scale m.VertexColor=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*(.5+(math.random()*.5)) m.Parent=p debris:AddItem(p,lifetime) local dealt=false p.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h and hit.Parent~=sp.Parent and h.Health>0 and not dealt then dealt=true local chr=sp.Parent if chr~=nil then local plr=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(chr) if plr then tagHumanoid(h,plr) end end h:TakeDamage(sdamage) end end end) p.CFrame=cframe p.Parent=game.Workspace return p end
magics={ Wave=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() for i=1,16 do local sscf=CFrame.new(t.Position,t.Position+t.CFrame.lookVector*Vector3.new(1,0,1))*CFrame.new(0,-6.5,-((i*3)+5))*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),0) local sscf2=sscf*CFrame.new(0,5,0) delay((i-1)*.1,function() local stick=spawnstick(sscf,4,nil,24) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf,sscf2,.1) wait(.2) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf2,sscf,.25) end) end wait(.5) end, Forest=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() for i=1,22 do local sscf=CFrame.new(t.Position)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*(i/22),0)*CFrame.new(0,-8,10)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),0)*CFrame.Angles(math.random()-.5,0,math.random()-.5) local sscf2=sscf*CFrame.new(0,10,0) delay((i%phi)*2,function() local stick=spawnstick(sscf,8,Vector3.new(2,2,2)) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf,sscf2,.1) wait(5) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf2,sscf,1) if stick then stick:remove() end end) end wait(3) end, Fort=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() for i=1,22 do local myphi=(i%phi)*(1+phi) local sscf=CFrame.new(t.Position)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*(i/22),0)*CFrame.new(0,-8,1+((1-myphi)*4))*CFrame.Angles(.5,math.pi*2*math.random(),0) local sscf2=sscf*CFrame.new(0,5+((1-myphi)*5),0) delay(0,function() local stick=spawnstick(sscf,8,Vector3.new(2,2,2)) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf,sscf2,.1+(myphi*.5)) wait(3+(1-myphi)*1) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf2,sscf,2-myphi) if stick then stick:remove() end end) end wait(4) end, Lift=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() delay(0,function() local tscf=CFrame.new(t.Position)*CFrame.new(0,-(3+(handle.Size.y*5*.5)),0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),0) local tscf2=tscf*CFrame.new(0,handle.Size.y*4.8,0) local trunk=spawnstick(tscf,20,Vector3.new(7,5,7)) trunk.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,30/5,0) tween(trunk,"CFrame",tscf,tscf2,5) trunk.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,0,0) wait(5) tween(trunk,"CFrame",tscf2,tscf,2) end) wait(1) end, Strike=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() local targetcf=CFrame.new(t.Position,t.Position+t.CFrame.lookVector*Vector3.new(1,0,1))*CFrame.new(0,-3,-15) for i=1,8 do local myphi=(i%phi)*(1+phi) delay(0,function() local stick=spawnstick(nil,5,Vector3.new(2,.2+((1-myphi)*3),2),22) local sscf=targetcf*CFrame.Angles(0,math.random()*math.pi*2,.2*myphi)*CFrame.new(myphi*2,-stick.Size.y*.6,0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.random()*math.pi*2,0) local sscf2=sscf*CFrame.new(0,stick.Size.y,0) stick.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,100,0) stick.CFrame=sscf tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf,sscf2,.25) wait(1) stick.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,0,0) wait(1) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf2,sscf,2) if stick then stick:remove() end end) end wait(1) end, Blast=function(t) specialsound:stop() specialsound.Pitch=1 specialsound:play() local targetcf=CFrame.new(t.Position,t.Position+t.CFrame.lookVector*Vector3.new(1,0,1))*CFrame.new(0,-3,-10) for i=1,10 do local myphi=(i%phi)*(1+phi) delay(0,function() local stick=spawnstick(nil,8,Vector3.new(2,.2+((1-myphi)*3),2),14) local sscf=targetcf*CFrame.Angles(0,math.random()*math.pi*2,-.7*myphi)*CFrame.new(0,-stick.Size.y*.5,0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.random()*math.pi*2,0) local sscf2=sscf*CFrame.new(0,stick.Size.y,0) stick.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,100,0) stick.CFrame=sscf tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf,sscf2,.25) stick.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,0,0) wait(1) stick.Velocity=Vector3.new(0,0,0) wait(1) tween(stick,"CFrame",sscf2,sscf,2) if stick then stick:remove() end end) end wait(2) end, }
sp.Enabled=true function onActivated() delay(.01,function() lastclick=tick() end) if sp.Enabled then sp.Enabled=false local character=sp.Parent; local humanoid=character.Humanoid if humanoid==nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end if (tick()-lastclick)<.2 and energy.Value>specialprice and specialdebounce then slashSound.Volume=1 slashSound:play() lunge() damage=0 local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") sp.RunAnim.Value="OverHeadSwing" if t~=nil then energy.Value=energy.Value-specialprice delay(0,function() specialdebounce=false magics[currentattack.Value](t) specialsound:stop() specialdebounce=true end) end wait(1) sp.RunAnim.Value="" else slashSound.Volume=.7 slashSound:play() newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] while newanim==sp.RunAnim.Value do newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] end sp.RunAnim.Value=newanim damage=slashdamage wait(.5) sp.RunAnim.Value="" end damage=basedamage sp.Enabled=true end end
function onEquipped() equipped=true end function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Activated:connect(onActivated) sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection=handle.Touched:connect(blow)
while true do if equipped then energy.Value=math.min(100,energy.Value+1) end wait(.3) end

--Made by Stickmasterluke
local sp=script.Parent
enabled=true handle=sp:WaitForChild("Handle") gui=sp:WaitForChild("StickGui") local button=gui:WaitForChild("ButtonHolder"):WaitForChild("Button") local fill=gui:WaitForChild("Bar"):WaitForChild("Fill") local currentattack=sp:WaitForChild("CurrentAttack") local energy=sp:WaitForChild("Energy") magics={ "Wave", "Strike", "Blast", "Fort", "Forest", "Lift", }
function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end enabled=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(.5) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled=true end
function changemode(a) currentmagic=currentmagic+a if currentmagic>#magics then currentmagic=1 elseif currentmagic<1 then currentmagic=#magics end currentattack.Value=magics[currentmagic] end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped if mouse==nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) if key then key=string.byte(key) if key==string.byte("q") then changemode(-1) elseif key==string.byte("e") then changemode(1) end end end) local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if plr then local plrgui=plr:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if plrgui then gui.Parent=plrgui end end end sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) sp.Unequipped:connect(function() gui.Parent=sp end)
sp:WaitForChild("RunAnim").Changed:connect(function() local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anim=sp:FindFirstChild(sp.RunAnim.Value) if anim and t and h then theanim=h:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and h.Health>0 then theanim:Play() end end end)
currentattack.Changed:connect(function() button.Text=currentattack.Value end) button.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() changemode(1) end)
energy.Changed:connect(function() local percent=energy.Value/100 fill.Size=UDim2.new(percent,0,1,0) fill.BackgroundColor3=Color3.new(percent,1,percent) end)
currentmagic=math.random(1,#magics) currentattack.Value=magics[currentmagic]
